title: Maruti Suzuki sales rise 12 pc to 1,79,228 units in June
description: Maruti Suzuki India reported a 12% increase in total wholesales for June, reaching 1,79,228 units compared to 1,59,418 units last year. Domestic passenger vehicle sales rose by 3% to 1,37,160 units. Export sales surged to 31,033 units from 19,770 units, while mini-segment car sales declined.
